tests.input: SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY col DESC)
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY col)
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY col) FILTER (WHERE id > 10)
SELECT PERCENTILE_DISC(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY col DESC)
SELECT PERCENTILE_DISC(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY col)
SELECT PERCENTILE_DISC(0.1) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY col) FILTER (WHERE id > 10)

select * from t
window w1 as (partition by a, b order by c rows between 1 preceding and 1 following),
       w2 as w1,
       w3 as w1
select * from t order by a cluster by a
select * from t order by a distribute by a
select * from t order by a sort by a
select * from t order by a, b desc
select * from t order by a, b desc limit 10
select * from t order by a, b desc window w1 as ()
select * from t order by a, b desc window w1 as () limit 10
select * from t sort by a, b desc
select * from t sort by a, b desc limit 10
select * from t sort by a, b desc window w1 as ()
select * from t sort by a, b desc window w1 as () limit 10
